name: @dopt/api-manifest
description: A package to copy and store our external specs from GCP

scripts.dev: echo "@dopt/api-manifest does not require dev"; exit 0;
scripts.format: echo "@dopt/api-manifest does not require formatting"; exit 0;
scripts.formatcheck: echo "@dopt/api-manifest does not require formatcheck"; exit 0;
scripts.lint: echo "@dopt/api-manifest does not require lint"; exit 0;
scripts.test: echo "@dopt/api-manifest does not require test"; exit 0;
scripts.typecheck: echo "@dopt/api-manifest does not require typecheck"; exit 0;
